## Quarto

Quarto enables you to weave together content and executable code into a finished document. To learn more about Quarto see <https://quarto.org>.

## Running Code

When you click the **Render** button a document will be generated that includes both content and the output of embedded code. You can embed code like this:

```{r}
1 + 1
```

You can add options to executable code like this

```{r}
#| echo: false
2 * 2
```

The `echo: false` option disables the printing of code (only output is displayed).


```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
my_diabetes_data<-read_csv("diabetes_binary_health_indicators_BRFSS2015.csv")
```

```{r}
colSums(is.na(my_diabetes_data))
unique(my_diabetes_data$Diabetes_binary)
```

```{r}
my_diabetes_data<-my_diabetes_data|>
  mutate(Fruits=factor(ifelse(Fruits==0, "No fruit", "Fruit")),
         Stroke=ifelse(Stroke==0, "No stroke", "Stroke"),
         Smoker=ifelse(Smoker==0, "No 100 cigs", "100 cigs"),
         HeartDiseaseorAttack=ifelse(HeartDiseaseorAttack==0, "No CHD/MI", "CHD/MI"),
         PhysActivity=ifelse(PhysActivity==0, "No physical activity past 30 days", "Physical activity past 30 days"),
         CholCheck=ifelse(CholCheck==0, "No cholesterol check in 5 years", "Cholesterol check in past 5 years"),
         HighChol=ifelse(HighChol==0, "No high cholesterol", "High cholesterol"),
         HighBP=ifelse(HighBP==0, "No high blood pressure", "High blood pressure"),
         Diabetes_binary=ifelse(Diabetes_binary==0, "No diabetes", "Diabetes"),
         Veggies=ifelse(Veggies==0, "No veggies", "Veggies"),
         HvyAlcoholConsump=ifelse(HvyAlcoholConsump==0, "Not heavy Drinker", "Heavy Drinker"),
         AnyHealthcare=ifelse(AnyHealthcare==0, "No healthcare", "Healthcare"),
         NoDocbcCost=ifelse(NoDocbcCost==0, "No doctor", "Doctor"),
         GenHlth=ifelse(GenHlth==1, "Excellent", ifelse(GenHlth==2, "Very good", ifelse(GenHlth==3, "Good", ifelse(GenHlth==4, "Fair", "Poor")))),
         DiffWalk=ifelse(DiffWalk==0, "Can walk", "Difficult walking"),
         Sex=ifelse(Sex==0, "female", "male"))

```
